page.title: 16CALVERLEY CHURCH
page.content: Our new Vicar is the Rev.David Sutcliffe,aged 56,who will be instituted on July 31st.1985 by The Rev.Roy Williamson,Bishop of Bradford. He will be taking over from our retiring vicar, the Rev Canon Lane.His hobbies include home wine making and chess but his real passion is collecting model elephants. Mrs.Garnet has recently taken over as Verger.She fills in forms and documents,arranges services,organises organists, ministers and their fees. Sometimes she shows people around the church and keeps the church clean and warm.She tries to do about two and a half hours every day. A group of ladies go in to clean once a week. This year the Graveyard is being tidied up by people from the Community Service Project.Young offenders who have to work for the community.
